name: Sportsball: Raptors Game Three
description:
Developed by Tap by Wattpad - AVAILABLE NOW ON MOBILE
Download Tap from the App Store to experience Twine stories on-the-go!
SPORTSBALL: Raptors Game Three
By Ryan LaPlante (@theryanlaplante)
It's game three in the NBA Finals...and a clueless writer has to explain what he thinks happens, only knowing the names of some players and the name of the sport!
...absurd satirical comic hijinks ensue.
